file_content.text: Looks like we were both hard at work. You've got the Barrager's location; I've got Doctor Carsiri.
Good thing, too. The Barrager lab's been fortified beyond recognition.
Freeing the Gorinth Brig prisoners must have put a scare into the Empire. They're driving us hard to finish the weapon.
I don't know if the Empire's aware you took the Barrager research along with its designers, but I'm on a new, incredibly short leash.
The Empire's made Darth Minax our overseer. She was a slave driver before, but now... any minor setback is grounds for execution.
Sith are deadly and unpredictable. Be cautious.
Don't let your guard down.
She's a real, live, red-skinned Sith nightmare.
I guess I can put myself on that list right now.
I'll be a major setback.
I'm close to being on it myself. There's only so many times I can pretend to need tools.
That's an average day working for a Hutt.
Don't let her scare you.
Hutts can be bargained with. Darth Minax knows only success and failure.
Any other developments?
You're asking for it, then.
I don't care. With the Barrager, the Empire could occupy Balmorra forever. We can't let that happen.
Without their research, Doctor Meln and Doctor Ortis couldn't have anticipated our progress. There's some vital extra steps to making their hack work.
Looks like they could have used your expertise.
Good thing you're around.
No one could have gotten as far as the Barrager's designers. I can just get you a little further.
The Empire's turned this lab into a fortress--and your hack is useless if you can't get inside.
Is there any way you could sabotage the new security?
But you're our inside man.
No chance. They've got us working, sleeping and eating in here.
What do you propose?
I didn't sign on for this.
No one said getting to the Barrager would be easy. That's why we enlisted you.
Use the Barrager spike on the subsystem controllers, then on the main power core. It'll allow full control when you arrive.
The approach to the lab's been equipped with new durasteel locks. The codes are kept on file at Imperial security stations throughout the factory.
You'll need to get the codes from each security station, then input them at access control. The lab door should be unlocked when you arrive.
No one will forget what you've done for Balmorra, doctor.
This is all thanks to you.
You've done your part, doctor. I don't want you caught in the cross fire.
Get somewhere safe.
If you're fighting, I'm fighting. Besides, I'd like to see the medal for risking my life.
Darth Minax would know I left for a reason. I can't risk that, not when you've come so--
Couldn't have done this without you, doc.
We owe you a lot.
I only did what any Balmorran would have done.
Believe me, stopping the Empire is reward enough. The Barrager--
You can count on me.
You've done more for Balmorra already than I ever thought possible.
If I wasn't already sure of that, I wouldn't have had the courage to--
I'd better get back before Darth Minax comes looking. I hope to meet you in person soon.
This is it. Follow Doctor Carsiri's instructions and get to the Barrager. Madine out.
I'll do everything I can. I'm in this until the--
Doctor? Doctor Carsiri? Well, the sooner you get to the Barrager lab, the sooner we can help him.
Keep this comm channel open. I'll do what I can to guide you. Now get going!
Good work. Signal's coming in clear as a bell.
Most of the power's being drawn to the administrative complex of the Balmorran Arms Factory. The Barrager must be there.
An administrative complex doesn't sound so threatening.
So the hard part's over.
Don't be so sure. Probably plenty of security still standing between you and the Barrager.
You're pretty handy.
Just doing my job. Now you have to do yours.
Great-- now get lost.
I've got Commander Madine on hold for you. If we don't meet again... well, for Balmorra's sake, I hope we do.
When I saw Commander Madine's message about the Barrager spike, I had to risk it.
This had better work.
This had better work.
You're pretty handy.
You're pretty handy.
Don't let your guard down.
Don't let your guard down.
This is all thanks to you.
This is all thanks to you.
Get somewhere safe.
Get somewhere safe.
We owe you a lot.
We owe you a lot.
You can count on me.
You can count on me.
This had better work.
This had better work.
